description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国副主席，正国级领导人。
description.en: A politician of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China, a national-level leader.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC and a Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委书记、中共中央政治局常委、全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Shanghai Party Secretary, a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC, and Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician currently serving as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委书记、上海市市长，后因上海社保基金挪用案被免职。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Shanghai Party Secretary and Mayor of Shanghai, later dismissed due to the Shanghai pension fund scandal.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任上海市市长、中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Mayor of Shanghai and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、科学家，曾任上海市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician and scientist who served as Mayor of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央组织部部长，现任全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee, and is currently the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任台北市市长、中国国民党副主席。
description.en: Taiwanese politician who served as Mayor of Taipei and Vice Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 韩正的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Han Zheng.

en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家副元首。
description.en: The deputy head of state of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
en: Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的副职领导人。
description.en: The deputy leaders of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的领导机构。
description.en: The leadership body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中央港澳工作领导小组

zh-cn: 中央港澳工作领导小组
中央港澳工作协调小组
en: Central Leading Group on Hong Kong and Macau Affairs

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责领导香港和澳门事务的议事协调机构。
description.en: A policy coordination body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for leading Hong Kong and Macau affairs.

nodes.id: 国家推进“一带一路”建设工作领导小组

zh-cn: 国家推进“一带一路”建设工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 负责推进“一带一路”建设工作的中国国家级议事协调机构。
description.en: A national-level policy coordination body in China responsible for advancing the Belt and Road Initiative.

nodes.id: 粤港澳大湾区建设领导小组

zh-cn: 粤港澳大湾区建设领导小组

description.zh-cn: 负责粤港澳大湾区建设工作的中国国家级议事协调机构。
description.en: A national-level policy coordination body in China responsible for the construction of the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area.

nodes.id: 中国共产党上海市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会
en: Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 上海市的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国的多数民族。
description.en: The majority ethnic group in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所顶尖研究型大学。
description.en: A top research university located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所著名综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A renowned comprehensive research university located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的直辖市，韩正的出生地及长期工作地。
description.en: A direct-administered municipality of the People's Republic of China, the birthplace and long-term workplace of Han Zheng.

description.zh-cn: 2006年上海市发生的一起社会保障基金挪用案件，导致时任上海市委书记陈良宇被免职。
description.en: A social security fund embezzlement case that occurred in Shanghai in 2006, leading to the dismissal of then-Shanghai Party Secretary Chen Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 2010年11月15日上海市静安区一幢公寓楼发生的特大火灾，时任市长韩正因此被问责。
description.en: A major fire in an apartment building in Jing'an District, Shanghai on November 15, 2010, for which then-Mayor Han Zheng was held accountable.

nodes.id: 查尔斯三世和卡蜜拉王后加冕礼

zh-cn: 查尔斯三世和卡蜜拉王后加冕礼
en: Coronation of Charles III and Camilla

description.zh-cn: 英国国王查尔斯三世和卡米拉王后的加冕仪式，韩正作为习近平的特别代表出席。
description.en: The coronation ceremony of King Charles III and Queen Camilla of the United Kingdom, which Han Zheng attended as a special representative of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 现任英国国王。
description.en: The reigning King of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 现任英国王后。
description.en: The reigning Queen of the United Kingdom.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国副主席

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
position.en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
position.en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 韩正担任中华人民共和国副主席期间，习近平担任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: While Han Zheng serves as Vice President of the People's Republic of China, Xi Jinping serves as President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 韩正接替王岐山出任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Han Zheng succeeded Wang Qishan as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理（排名第一）
position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China (ranking first)

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 韩正担任国务院副总理期间，李克强担任国务院总理。
description.en: While Han Zheng served as Vice Premier of the State Council, Li Keqiang served as Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 根据国务院总理李克强的提名，韩正被任命为国务院副总理。
description.en: Han Zheng was appointed Vice Premier of the State Council upon the nomination of Premier Li Keqiang.

description.zh-cn: 丁薛祥接替韩正出任排名第一的国务院副总理。
description.en: Ding Xuexiang succeeded Han Zheng as the first-ranking Vice Premier of the State Council.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

position.zh-cn: 中央政治局常委（排名第七）
position.en: Member of the Politburo Standing Committee (ranking seventh)

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局
中央港澳工作领导小组
国家推进“一带一路”建设工作领导小组
粤港澳大湾区建设领导小组
中国共产党上海市委员会

description.zh-cn: 韩正接替俞正声出任中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Han Zheng succeeded Yu Zhengsheng as the Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李强接替韩正出任中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Li Qiang succeeded Han Zheng as the Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 因陈良宇被停职，韩正代理中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Due to Chen Liangyu's suspension, Han Zheng became the acting Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 习近平接替韩正的代理职务，正式出任上海市委书记。
description.en: Xi Jinping succeeded Han Zheng's acting role to officially become the Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

degree.zh-cn: 政教专业学习；经济学硕士
degree.en: Political Education Studies; Master of Economics

description.zh-cn: 韩正在上海大中华橡胶厂任职期间，时任上海市长朱镕基曾前往考查，并对韩正的工作予以了肯定。
description.en: While Han Zheng was working at the Shanghai Dazhonghua Rubber Factory, then-Mayor of Shanghai Zhu Rongji inspected the factory and affirmed Han Zheng's work.

description.zh-cn: 韩正担任上海市副市长期间，徐匡迪是时任市长之一。
description.en: While Han Zheng served as Deputy Mayor of Shanghai, Xu Kuangdi was one of the incumbent mayors.

description.zh-cn: 韩正担任上海市副市长期间，陈良宇是时任市长之一。
description.en: While Han Zheng served as Deputy Mayor of Shanghai, Chen Liangyu was one of the incumbent mayors.

description.zh-cn: 因受到上海社保基金挪用案波及，时任中共上海市委书记陈良宇被停职。
description.en: Affected by the Shanghai pension fund scandal, then-Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee Chen Liangyu was suspended from his duties.

description.zh-cn: 因陈良宇被停职，韩正代理中共上海市委书记职务。
description.en: Due to Chen Liangyu's suspension, Han Zheng became the acting Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 时任上海市市长的韩正因上海“11·15”特别重大火灾被国务院责成作出深刻检讨。
description.en: Then-Mayor of Shanghai Han Zheng was ordered by the State Council to make a profound self-criticism for the 2010 Shanghai fire.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央组织部部长赵乐际在宣布任命时评价，中央认为韩正同志担任上海市委书记是合适的。
description.en: Then-head of the CPC Central Committee's Organization Department Zhao Leji commented during the appointment announcement that the Central Committee considered Han Zheng suitable for the position of Shanghai Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 前台北市长郝龙斌称呼韩正为“台北市的老朋友、好朋友”。
description.en: Former Taipei Mayor Hau Lung-pin referred to Han Zheng as 'an old friend and a good friend of Taipei City'.

description.zh-cn: 韩正作为习近平的特别代表出席了英国国王查尔斯三世和卡米拉王后加冕仪式。
description.en: Han Zheng attended the coronation of King Charles III and Queen Camilla as a special representative of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 韩正出席了在伦敦举行的英国国王查尔斯三世加冕仪式。
description.en: Han Zheng attended the coronation ceremony of King Charles III in London.

description.zh-cn: 韩正出席了在伦敦举行的卡米拉王后加冕仪式。
description.en: Han Zheng attended the coronation ceremony of Queen Camilla in London.

position.zh-cn: 中共上海市委代理书记
position.en: Acting Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee

description.zh-cn: 韩正代理上海市委书记期间，胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记。
description.en: While Han Zheng was the acting Party Secretary of Shanghai, Hu Jintao was the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.
